text:
Carolina Darias San Sebastián (born 25 November 1965) is a Spanish politician. She is a member of the Spanish Socialist Workers' Party (PSOE). Since 2020, she has been the Minister of Territorial Policy and Civil Service. She also served as President of the Parliament of the Canary Islands (2015–2019) and the Regional Minister of Economy, Knowledge and Employment of the Canary Islands (2019–2020). She was born in Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Canary Islands.
On 12 March 2020, during the 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic, it was made clear that Darias had tested positive to COVID-19.

annotations.surface_form: Minister of Territorial Policy and Civil Service
President of the Parliament of the Canary Islands
